title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplifying multicloud developer experience, feat. Macquarie (HMC323)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 简化多云开发者体验，特邀麦格理集团 (HMC323)
abstract: Developing  applications across multiple clouds creates unique challenges: fragmented  tooling across cloud providers and complex environment-specific  configurations. Macquarie Group simplified their developer experience by  creating a Developer Environments as Code platform that provides a unified  development experience across all cloud environments. This internal solution combines enterprise security and developer flexibility, enabling teams to use  their preferred IDEs for multicloud deployment while maintaining organizational standards. Additionally, it reduces environment setup from days to minutes and ensures  consistent deployments across multicloud environments.
abstract_cn: 跨多个云开发应用程序会带来独特的挑战：云提供商之间的工具碎片化以及复杂的特定环境配置。麦格理集团通过创建开发环境即代码平台简化了开发者体验，该平台在所有云环境中提供统一的开发体验。这个内部解决方案结合了企业安全性和开发者灵活性，使团队能够使用他们首选的IDE进行多云部署，同时保持组织标准。此外，它将环境设置时间从数天缩短到数分钟，并确保跨多云环境的一致部署。
